question: Are you interested in the field of product quality assurance?

answers.description: QA Engineer is someone much more than a person that is working with testing. This person takes care of the highest quality of the code, analyses the results of testing and creates plan for it.

question: Do you know and want to use test automation frameworks?

answers.description: Test Automation Engineer is a person that based on the test procedure prepares test written in one of programming language or with a help of automation tool to make them possible to execute without human assistance.
Manual tester is a person that checks if the software is working as it should and performs the test manually.
